attributes.action: Immediate general election to reinstate a new government
attributes.additional_details:
Hold a general election 
Allow the public to be heard rather then making the decisions in house
attributes.background:
Immediate effect to reinstate a new government leadership 
Facilitate a structure to public spending 
Forecast a future for Britain

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781

The Petitions Committee has scheduled a debate on the above petition for Monday 17 October. You can watch this here from 4.30pm: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qMHQNKdbu-Q&list=PLj3mInRJqIemzke3yWcmPaR5ZTW4S4bur&index=1
